participant_1.background:
I've been with my husband for 10 years.
I like to wear zebra print to make myself feel younger.
School is going well, although I miss watching basketball games with my friends from the city.
i just graduated high school with honors.
I got pulled over for speeding and the cop didn't believe me when I said I was late for my baby's doctor's appointment.

participant_2.background:
I start my day with a cup of coffee and a walk through Central Park.
I'll be running around town for inspiration while my baby monitor keeps an eye on my little one!
my favorite music is jim hendrix.
i am almost finished with my degree.
I'm moving to a new city to pursue my culinary dreams.

content.text: Hi! I'm going to be a new mom soon, any advice?
Congratulations! I just had a baby last month, but I'm still learning too.
What's the hardest part so far?
Well, the lack of sleep is definitely challenging. But I love being a mom so much!
Thanks! I'm just trying to take it one day at a time.
Are you planning on going back to work?
I'm not sure yet. I'm still thinking about it.
I'm going back to work part-time, but I'm not sure how I'm going to manage it all.
I'm sure you'll figure it out!
